summary: I'm Rino Setola and I'm an expert in programming, software development, and teaching in the STEM sector

curriculum.name: Rino Setola
curriculum.description: I'am Rinos and I'am a highly skilled professional in programming, software development, and STEM education. I have a comprehensive background in modern web development, cloud technologies, database management, and embedded systems. With advanced proficiency in multiple programming languages and strong problem-solving skills, I am adept at creating dynamic solutions for various challenges.

children.name: WEB
children.description: Expert in modern web development using technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python. Skilled in creating dynamic and responsive websites.

children.name: SYS
children.description: Experienced in working with embedded systems such as Arduino and Raspberry Pi, focusing on hardware integration and programming.

children.name: CLOUD
children.description: Proficient in cloud technologies including AWS, Azure, and GCP, with a focus on data management and deployment strategies.

children.name: DB
children.description: Experienced in managing relational and non-relational databases, optimizing performance, and ensuring data integrity.

children.name: CODE
children.description: Advanced proficiency in multiple programming languages, with strong problem-solving skills and software development expertise.

children.name: TEACHING
children.description: Extensive experience in conducting STEM courses, including programming in Python, AI applications, and robotics, catering to diverse age groups.

children.name: STEM Courses
children.description: Teaching Python programming, artificial intelligence, and robotics to various age groups.

children.name: Educational Workshops
children.description: Conducting hands-on workshops with Raspberry Pi, Arduino, and robotics design.

children.name: EDUCATION
children.description: Comprehensive academic background in Mathematics and Scientific Computing, complemented by certifications in Python and backend development.

children.name: Mathematics Degree
children.description: Master's degree from the Second University of Naples.

children.name: Scientific Computing Master's
children.description: Second-level Master's degree from La Sapienza University in Rome.

children.name: IT Certifications
children.description: Certifications in Python programming, relational databases, and backend development.

children.name: AI
children.description: Expert in AI technologies, specializing in OpenAI, Gemini, and Anthropic APIs, with practical experience using the OpenCV library.
